,alt:"Nike Slogan"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nikeSignUpCard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nikeLogoContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"nikeLogo",src:"/media/logo1.png",alt:"Nike Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"nikeForm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"nikeSignUpTitle",children:"CREATE YOUR ACCOUNT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nikeInputGroup",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email address",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),className:"nikeInputField",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"nikeInputField",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Confirm Password",value:confirmPassword,onChange:e=>setConfirmPassword(e.target.value),className:"nikeInputField",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nikeRememberForgot",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"nikeCheckbox",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",className:"nikeCheckboxInput"}),"Keep me signed in"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"nikeSubmitButton",children:"SIGN UP"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nikeSignInText",children:["Already a Member?",' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",className:"nikeSignInLink",children:"Sign In"})]})]})]})]})});};export default NikeSignUpPage;
